name: Forgotten Realms: Unlimited Adventures
summary: Forgotten Realms: Unlimited Adventures, also known as Unlimited Adventures, is a video game originally released on March 17, 1993, by Strategic Simulations, Inc. for the IBM PC and Apple Macintosh.
